Homework 4
========================================================

## Question 1:

### The following table shows a discrete probability distribution.
x | p(x)
---|---
0|	0
1|	.1
2|	.2
3|	.4
4|	.1
5|	.2

Find the expected value (mean) of this probability distribution. Please round to 1 decimal place.

```{r}
x <- 0:5
px <- c(0, 0.1, 0.2, 0.4, 0.1, 0.2)
sum(x*px)
```
